messages.title: Dear Resident,
messages.content: As MP for Twickenham I will stand up for the issues local people care about: good quality schools; affordable homes; a clean environment and protection from the Tories' reckless Brexit. Twickenham schools are under unprecedented pressure to cut costs. Housing costs are rising due to lack of supply. A Labour government will deliver growth by investing in homes and infrastructure, creating jobs and raising wages. It will invest in our children and protect school funding. Voters in Twickenham need a better choice than the Tories and their former coalition partners the Lib Dems. Labour offers a real alternative.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will build a high skilled, high tech, low carbon economy. We will raise the living wage to £10 an hour and unlock £500 billion of investment through a National Investment Bank.
We will build over a million new homes in five years, with at least half a million council homes, through our public investment strategy, and give new rights to private renters.
We will end exploitative zero-hours contracts and undercutting through exploitation of migrant labour. We will defend employment rights during the Brexit negotiations.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A secure NHS and social care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will end NHS privatisation, integrate health and social care and ensure parity for mental health services.
We will provide universal childcare and guarantee quality apprenticeships and adult skills training. We will work towards progressive restoration of free education for all.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voters in Twickenham need a better choice than the Tories and their former coalition partners the Lib Dems.
